frontmatter.title: Light Sail, OH GOD WHY and some grindcore

node.excerpt: Articles LightSail2 is working! A nuclear war might make crops stop growing, so we need a backup plan. TL;DR: prepping for the apocalypse…
First off, some updates: I've removed the Google Fonts dependency. Uses a couple of self-hosted fonts with system fallback now. Small visual…
